actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to eliminate a discharge from an armed force under conditions other than honorable on the basis of a continuous absence without authority for one hundred and eighty days or more as a bar to receipt of benefits under laws administered by the Veterans Administration.

summary.text: Eliminates a discharge from an armed force under conditions other than honorable on the basis of a continuous absence without authority for 180 days or more as a bar to receipt of benefits under laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate a discharge from an armed force under conditions other than honorable on the basis of a continuous absence without authority for one hundred and eighty days or more as a bar to receipt of benefits under laws administered by the Veterans Administration.
